headline: FDA Cardiac Clearance Expands Intuitive Surgical da Vinci 5 Opportunity
summary: Intuitive Surgical (NasdaqGS:ISRG) received FDA clearance for its da Vinci 5 system to be used in certain cardiac procedures. The decision expands the system beyond its traditional focus areas into heart surgery, one of the largest segments in hospital care. The clearance opens access to a broader set of minimally invasive options for patients and hospitals that use da Vinci platforms. Intuitive Surgical is known for its da Vinci robotic systems, which are used across a range of minimally...

headline: 2 S&P 500 Stocks to Research Further and 1 Facing Challenges
summary: While the S&P 500 (^GSPC) includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds.
